offers.title: Deep Home Cleaning
offers.shortDesc: Professional deep cleaning for homes and furnished apartments.
offers.description: We provide deep cleaning including floors, windows, kitchens, bathrooms, carpets and furniture using professional equipment. Suitable for homes after renovation or long-term rental.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
